Title: In the Name of God
Writer: Shoaib Mansoor, Faiza Mujahid (lyrics), Bulleh Shah (lyrics)
Actors: Shaan Shahid, Fawad Khan, Iman Ali, Austin Marie Sayre
Plot: The movie deals with the difference of opinion between the westernized, educated, modern Muslims and their counterparts who follow their religion and live life in the name of 'God'.
